name: Palm paradise
description: A beach sunset with palm tree. I do not own the picture of the beach though. It was been painted over with green and purple.

user.about:
My styles may look a bit fuzzy on the screenie, but there perfectly normal when you install them. I make styles for Foopets.com only.

If you have a request, tell me what colour you want and your Foopets username, so then I can tell you want page its on and when its done.
